resources.string: The button at the right side of the screen will help you to move the snake to right or down side. The button at the left will help you to move the snake to left or up side.\n\n Or you can touch the border part of snake to control the game. The snake will move at the side you will touch.

Md. Asaduzzaman Arabin,
Department of EEE,
2017-18 Session,
Rajshahi University
